DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety effectiveness OCS™ Lung recruit , preserve assess donor lung may meet current standard donor lung acceptance criterion transplantation .
DOC.detailed_description: The OCS™ Lung use recruit , preserve assess donor lung may meet current standard donor lung acceptance criterion one follow characteristic : - Donor PaO2/FiO2 ≤ 300 mmHg ; - Expected ischemic time > 6 hour ; - Donor Cardiac Death ( DCD donor ) ; - Donor age ≥55 year old
DOC.criteria: At least one following : Donor PaO2/FiO2 ≤ 300 mmHg ; Expected ischemic time > 6 hour ; Donor Cardiac Death ( DCD donor ) ; Donor age ≥55 year old • Presence moderate severe traumatic lung injury air and/or blood leak Presence confirm active pneumonia persistent purulent secretion repeat bronchoscopy evaluation ET suction Previous history pulmonary disease Multiple transfusion > 10 pRBCs unit ABO incompatibility Tobacco history > 20 pack year
